1113321.content:
One day, outside of capsule Corp while Goku was visiting Bulma, Bulma suddenly out of the blue made a proposition for Goku.
“Hey goku I have a fun idea for a little game we could play” Bulma says with a devilish grin on her face.”huh? Ok what is it Bulma” Goku asks with a look of sheer confusion on his face.
“Alright,Goku here’s the deal we’re going to play a game of scissors,rock,paper,First to three wins, And if I win then I get to dress you up and make you act however I want for three months” Says Bulma.
“Oh okay I get it” saying Goku who lights up at the idea of a challenge.
“And if I win then,you don’t get to take a bath for three months” with Goku laughing at the image of a repugnant smelling Bulma.
Bulma then laughs back at Goku retorting with “alright let’s do this,then” with a look of bold confidence on her face. Both then walked up to each other and proceeded to stare the other down, with both trying to think of what the other would do,And then almost in unison both shouted out “scissors,rock,paper!” With Bulma winning the first round with a pair of scissors, Leaving Goku dumbfounded as he was certain that she would choose rock.
Goku was then snapped out off this state by Bulmas laughing “(giggles) surprised goku
“A little yeah, but it’s not like your going to get me next time” says Goku with some regained confidence.
Both then stare each other down again, As the awkward ard silence returns again only to be crushed by the sound of two people screaming “scissors,rock,paper!”
Goku is left dumbfounded again as Bulma now crushes his puny scissors with her rock
Bulma then snaps Goku back to reality again by saying”come on Goku I haven’t got all day to wait for you to lose” snickering after she says that.
Goku then rather annoyed blurts out to Bulma “Oh Yeah Well we’ll see about that.
As Goku then concentrates as hard as he can to think of something that Burma wouldn’t suspect, But before that Bulma catches Goku of guard by saying “scissors,rock,paper!” as goku is forced to think on the spot.
And like that the match was over, Bulma winning three nil
“(Snicker) well goku it seems that you’ve lost which means I get to make you dress and act however I want”
“W-what are you going to do to me!?” Goku mutters out with a hint of fear.
Bulma then snickers “Simple Goku, I’m going to turn you into my adorable,precious little sister”
“What does that mean!?” Goku says in confused fear thinking that bulls might turn him into some kind of food and eat him.
Bulma then laughs at goku s confusion knowing just what’s in store for him “You’ll see, precious” as she proceeds to drag goku into her bedroom consisting of; two giant pink fluffy beds, a vanity mirror with tons and hundreds of makeup products made by capsule Corp on it, and a gigantic wardrobe full of tons of dresses and wigs,some of which were in goku’s size. “Wow your rooms huge!” Says goku taken away by the size of it.”Thank you Goku,now from here on out you are to refer to me as big sis and you will be referred to as sis,understand Sis” says Bulma in a condescending tone.
“Aw but, do I gotta Bulma” complained Goku
“Yes sis”(snickers) remember you lost the bet and now have to do whatever I say remember, Sis (snickers)” Says Bulma in a mocking tone.
Goku then sighs in defeat,”yes Big sis”
Bulma then snickers over the power she has over Goku “Aww,very good Sis (snickers) so now that we’ve got that out of the way, let’s get you looking nice and pretty sis (snickers) now go sit on that chair next to the mirror while I get some things for your makeover sis”
Goku then proceeds to the chair and sits there while Bulma comes back with two wigs.
“Now since I’m feeling nice today sis, I’ll let you choose how precious you wanna look so what one do you choose? Do you wanna be a cute little brunette and look super adorable (snickers) Or do you wanna be an adorable blonde and look super pretty sis?”
1113321.title: He loses a bet with bulma

11133211.content:
Goku looked back and forth between the 2 wigs and finally pointed at the brunette wig.

"I'll choose that wag, Bulma. I mean, Big Sis."

"Looks like you still need practice calling me Big Sis," said Bulma as she giggled.

Bulma then set aside the blonde wig that she was not going to use and took the brunette wig and smiled down at Goku.

"Watch this now, sis."

Goku then remained silent, but very nervous, as Bulma placed the brunette wig over his head. He then watched as Bulma began to move the wig around in place, completely covering up his spiky, black hair. After about a few minutes, Bulma had the wig in place. The hair went down to Goku's neck and the hair was in a wavy hair style.

"Th-that's me?" asked Goku in surprise when Bulma was done. Even though he had watched Bulma, he could barely recognize himself.

"Of course that's you. What, can't recognize yourself, sis?"

"N-no," merely responded Goku as he started running his hands through the wig's hair, almost in a trance.

Bulma giggled as she watched Goku. If he was reacting this way from just the wig, then she could only imagine his surprise at his appearance once she was done. Bulma then thought about whether to do the makeup or the clothes next.
11133211.title: Goku chooses the cute brunette  wig

Bulma decided that it would be best to do the makeup first while they were at the vanity table.

1113321121.content:
Goku looked between the blue and silver ball gown and the yellow dress and pointed at the blue and silver ball gown.

"I choose that one. That blue reminds me of the old gi I used to wear when I lived by myself."

"Oh yeah, your outfit when we first met was blue," added Bulma as she giggled that Goku chose the ball gown simply because he liked blue.

"Now before we get you in this ball gown, you need to try out the heels first. You're not used to wearing heels, so we should start with them first."

"What do you mean, Bulma? I mean Big Sis," asked Goku.

"You'll see. Please take off your shoes, sis."

Goku did as he was told, now all of a sudden very nervous, and then watched Bulma as she brought the heels. She then put them on Goku's feet and asked him to stand. As Goku tried to stand, he lost his balance and began to fall. But before he fell to the ground, Bulma grabbed him by the wrist.

"There, there, sis. Big sis is here to help you and make sure you don't get hurt," said Bulma as she rubbed Goku's wrist very delicately like he was a delicate girl rather than a strong boy.

"These shoes are very hard to keep my balance, replied Goku.

"I know. That's why we're doing this "training" to help you get used to the heels, sis."

The mention of this being training lit a fire in Goku's eyes as he accepted the challege. Goku then brgan trying to stand with the heels and whenever he started to fall, Bulma was there to keep him from falling like a protective big sister.

Once Goku got that down, then he started trying to walk in them. Just like before, Bulma was there to stop him from falling and giving him encouraging words. After a while, Goku eventually was starting to walk in the heels without falling.

"I'm doing it! I'm walking in these heels!" yelled Goku happily.

Bulma giggled at how proud Goku felt at walking in the heels.

"Good job, sis. I'm very proud of you."

Bulma then went up to Goku and gave her sister a huge hug. At first, Goku was caught off guard by the hug, but then he returned the hug.

"It's thanks to you, Big Sis," said Goku, caught up in the sisterly moment. Goku's words just made Bulma hug Goku harder.
1113321121.title: The blue and silver ball gown

choices: Bulma decides to teach Goku some dancing since he's in his gown.
11133211211.content:
As Goku and Bulma broke from their hug, Bulma placed hre hands around Goku's hips and Goku blushed in embarrassment o what just happened.

"I-I'm sorry about that. I got carried away when I was able to-" started stammering Goku as he looked at Bulma with a blushing, embarrassed facce.

"There, there, sis. There's nothing to be embarrassed about. You got happy that you were able to walk in those heels and your Big Sis is very proud of you."

Bulma then smiled a bit and added, "You look really cute when you're blushing like this."

"But that's just it. It was all because of shoes that I've never worn before. I'm a fighter and these heels don't look like-".

"But you're not a fighter right now. You're my precious little sister. Big Sis will protect you."

Bulma then squeezed Goku protectively as if Goku was a weak girl. After a few moments, she could tell that Goku was calming down and she smiled to herself; she wanted Goku to remove himself from the strong boy that he is and to see himself as an ordinary girl that looked up to and felt protected by her big sister for at least the 3 months of their bet.

"Now then, let's get that ball gown on you, sis," said Bulma.

"O-okay, Big Sis," replied Goku, still a little worked up from just now, but relaxing.

Bulma then led Goku back to his seat and removed his heels. She then helped Goku get out of his clothes without messing up his wig and then went to her dresser and pulled out a pair of light blue panties. She gave them to Goku and with an encouraging nod, Goku put the panties on. Bulma then got the blue and silver ball gown and helped Goku in it.

Once Bulma was done with that, she put the heels back on Goku's feet and held his hand as she helped him stand up.

"What do you think, sis?" asked Bulma as she turned Goku so he could see himself in the mirror.

"This feels weird. I'm not used to these clothes."

"Don't worry about a silly thing like that. I think you look very beautiful."

Bulma then gave Goku another hug and Goku was starting to relax again. Goku wasn't sure why, but he was starting to like the feeling of Bulma holding him like this. He felt safe in Bulma's hands. Even though he knew that he was a lot stronger than Bulma and didn't need her to protect him, when Bulma held him like this, he believed Bulma that Big Sis would protect him. These thoughts and feelings were very confusing to Goku.

Remember, Goten-in-Goku is not exactly used to being in his father's older, stronger and bigger body, (how can he; he's only 6 years old), so Goku has to first teach Goten how to fight like him and how to control his new strength; a task easier said than done, since Goten keeps falling over in his father's body, because he is not used to the new hight-and-depth perceptions that his father's body gives him.
Also, because of his father's body's much larger size and longer limbs, Goten keeps tripping and getting dizzy, so he first has to get used to his father's body, before any combat training begins.

Okay; so the youngest of Son Goku's sons will end up swapping bodies with his dad's biggest rival/his best friend's dad.

The fact that he'd also be inside the body of the father of his best friend could be seen as another bonus, since it would allow Goten and Trunks to spend even more time together.
Although; since Goten is still a kid inside a grown-up body, it likely wouldn't be too long before someone would notice 'Vegita' acting way out of character...

Vegita, on the other hand, would most likely be enraged beyond belief at the fact that he's now inside Goten's body; for not only is he now a little kid again, but he'd also be forced to spend a lot of time together with Goku, his most hated rival. Being forced by Goten's mom, Chichi, to go to school would also be infuriating to Vegita, since he'd be with other boys Goten's age for a good portion of the day.
Of course, Vegita would likely try to find a way to swap himself and Goten back in their own bodies, but it might not be as easy as he thinks it will be, since Chichi thinks that 'Goten' is much too young to go whereever he want to...

That said, the non-combatants like Chi-Chi and Bulma found themselves exploring other pursuits. One day the two ladies were enjoying a call while working on their own projects.

"So tell me about this clothing line?" Chi-Chi inquired.

"Oh. Hey Mom. Hey Bulma." He chirped as he walked by.

"Perfect! Gohan, your mother has a question for you!" Bulma called. Gohan stopped and returned to them.

"O-oh! Yes! Right! Sweety, I've been thinking of signing you up for some Nuclear Physics classes! Wouldn't that be wonderful?"

Gohan's face immediately filled with dread.

"Sooo... your first modeling job is tomorrow morning! We're gonna do a nice commercial for the new brand! Be sure to show up nice and early!" Bulma mocked as she walked out of the house.

Following the devastating events of the Cell Games, most of the Z Warriors took some much needed time off. Android 18, having more or less joined up with the crew, ended up staying at Kami house until she could get herself some cash to get somewhere for herself.

During this time, she basically evicted Roshi for... well... she's an attractive woman and he's Master Roshi. It's a pretty easy thread to follow.

"He's not here. I kicked him out until he can learn to behave himself. Now what do you want?" she growled, annoyed that he had interrupted her day.

"Oh. Sorry! I just came to get my baseball stuff. I left it here and--"

18 reached inside the door and literally threw a duffel bag of bats, balls, and a uniform at Yamcha. He barely caught it and was knocked off balance at that.

"Ugh... thanks.." he said, clutching his stomach in pain as he sat the bag down and began to look through it to make sure everything was there.

"Yeah. I'd say I'm pretty good at it!" he replied with a snarky laugh.

"Tch. You wish" 18 hissed, rolling her eyes.

"No. Seriously! I'm going Pro!"

18 simply glared at him.

"Alright hotshot. I bet I can hit a ball further out into the ocean than you."

"Wait wait! What's with the hostility?" he replied.

"For one, you're interrupting my day. Two, you're a braggart and I hate that. You remind me of Vegeta. Though you're nowhere near as intimidating. Which says a lot since Vegeta is as intimidating as a squirrel."

Yamcha paused a moment, then looked at her with incredible tenacity.

"Fine. You wanna make a bet? Let's make a bet. You hit that ball farther than me and I will be your personal manservant for a month. I'll live here, or even sleep outside. Do whatever you want. Act how you want. Whatever." he said in anger.

"But if you somehow manage to win?" she scoffed.

"Just the opposite. You serve me. Deal?" he spat.

18 paused.

"Even if one wins, what's to keep the other from backing out?" she questioned.

"If one of us fails to uphold the terms of the agreement... you could probably kick my ass. And I'd bet that creepy scientist who made you had something in that lab I could use on you." he said with a grin.

"Fine. Deal. Give me a damn bat." she hissed. Yamcha tossed her a bat, wound up a pitch, and threw. She smacked the ball so hard the bat practically exploded in her hands and it went soaring into the distance, falling into the ocean with a loud PLUNK. Unlike 18, his bat didn't explode. He knew just how hard to hit to get the distance he wanted. The ball flew into the air and rushed towards the horizon, eventually disappearing. Becoming completely unseeable to the naked eye due to sheer distance.

18 stood horrified.

"So. Why don't we head on inside servant" he laughed as he walked into Kame house.

Yamcha sat himself down and looked up at the frustrated blonde.

"Ugh.. what do you want me to do?" she muttered.

"What was that? Speak up!" he joked.

"What do you want me to do?" she repeated, annoyed.

A few months had passed and needless to say, things had changed a lot on Planet Sadala. Before, Caulifla had been known as one of the strongest Saiyans, especially after word had previously spread about how well the 3 Saiyans fron Universe 6 had done in the Tournament of Power.

But when word had spread about Caulifla going from a tomboy to a girly girl named "Flower" and she had become Kale's underling, a lot of other Saiyans were outraged. At first, many Saiyans had come to beat up Caulifla, but true to her new station in life, she fled from the fight and ran to Miss Kale for protection, which only infuriated the challengers further. However, Kale took her promise to protect her precious underling very seriously and beat them all to near death. After doing this a few more times, the other Saiyans stopped attacking Caulifla for fear of Kale.

Those early acts only deepened Flower's loyalty to Miss Kale as she spent her days doing whatever task Kale had her do and showing off to Miss Kale how pretty she was in her various outfits. Flower even eventually got over any embarrassment that remained about being a girly girl. Flower grew to fully embrace all aspects of her new life as Miss Kale's pretty underling.

One night, after she had bid goodnight to Miss Kale, Flower went to her room and changed into a nightgown that Miss Kale had given to her. She tucked in bed and smiled at a picture that had recently been taken that showed her and Miss Kale dancing together.

'I'm so very lucky to have Miss Kale in my life,' thought Flower to herself as she drifted to sleep. 'I hope these days with her lasts forever.'

info.brief_description: The cast of the Dragon Ball series experience changes
info.description:
The characters of the Dragon Ball franchise undergo changes. Physical, mental, any kind really. Just keep things consistent. Also, the changes don't always need to affect everybody.

Try to be creative, and don't make every path come to the same conclusion. Not every path needs to lead to physical changes. And some of my favorite ideas involve no physical changes.
As for how things happen, it all depends on the storyline you pick.

Feel free to use any of the iterations of the anime to set it in, be it the original Dragon Ball timeframe, Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball GT, or even the currently ongoing (As of writing this) Dragon Ball Super. Or, if you want, you are even allowed to use the game setting of Xenoverse or Fusions, if you want to use characters from different time periods interacting together

Stick to actual characters and not original ones. In the case of Xenoverse and Fusions, stick to the canon versions of the protagonists if you want to use them.
Sex is allowed, but just don't make every path solely about sex
Normally I say no killing off characters, but thats a minor inconvenience in Dragon Ball
No ending the story
Please try to have good grammar and such
Always use all available option spots, and don't try to force a specific path.

And of course, have fun!
